title: Project-Based System Analysis and Design: AI and Data Visualization Integrated Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: For learners in managerial/leadership roles, requiring strengthened system design competencies immediately applicable to practical projects

learning_goals: Users can design a system integrating AI chatbots and dashboards by applying Merrill’s Pebble-in-the-Pond model.
Learners can analyze technical issues arising from single-database integration and propose solutions.
Participants can complete project outcomes integrating analytical, AI, and design perspectives through 15-minute segmented mobile learning sessions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
